text: (firaun ne) kahaah tum usaka vishvaas kar baithe, isase pahale ki main tumhen aagya doon? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara bada (guroo) hai, jisane tumhen jaadoo sikhaaya hai, to tumhen sheeghr gyaan ho jaayega, main avashy tumhaare haathon tatha pairon ko vipareet disha[1] se kaat doonga tatha tum sabhee ko phaansee de doonga
